data.katex: \brand{\cdot x} \ | \ x + \dfrac{1}{x} = 2 \ | \ \brand{\cdot x} \\ x\left( x + \frac{1}{x} \right) = 2x \\ x^2 + \frac{\cancel{x}}{\cancel{x}} = 2x \\ x^2 + 1 = 2x

children.storageKey: $$ \brand{\cdot x} \ | \ x + \dfrac{1}{x} = 2 \ | \ \brand{\cdot x} \\ x\left( x + \frac{1}{x} \right) = 2x \\ x^2 + \frac{\cancel{x}}{\cancel{x}} = 2x \\ x^2 + 1 = 2x $$

(x−2)(x+3)=5x2+3x−2x−6=5x2+x−6=5(x - 2)(x + 3) = 5 \\ x^2 + 3x - 2x - 6 = 5 \\ x^2 + x - 6 = 5(x−2)(x+3)=5x2+3x−2x−6=5x2+x−6=5

⋅x ∣ x+1x=2 ∣ ⋅xx(x+1x)=2xx2+xx=2xx2+1=2x\brand{\cdot x} \ | \ x + \dfrac{1}{x} = 2 \ | \ \brand{\cdot x} \\ x\left( x + \frac{1}{x} \right) = 2x \\ x^2 + \frac{\cancel{x}}{\cancel{x}} = 2x \\ x^2 + 1 = 2x⋅x ∣ x+x1​=2 ∣ ⋅xx(x+x1​)=2xx2+x​x​​=2xx2+1=2x
−2x ∣ x2+1=2x ∣ −2x−2x+x2+1=2x−2xx2−2x+1=0\brand{- 2x} \ | \ x^2 + 1 = 2x \ | \ \brand{- 2x} \\ -2x + x^2 + 1 = \cancel{2x} - \cancel{2x} \\ x^2 - 2x + 1 = 0−2x ∣ x2+1=2x ∣ −2x−2x+x2+1=2x−2xx2−2x+1=0
x2+2x=x2x^2 + 2x = x^2x2+2x=x2

−x2 ∣ x2+2x=x2 ∣ −x2−x2+x2+2x=x2−x22x=0\brand{- x^2} \ | \ x^2 + 2x = x^2 \ | \ \brand{- x^2} \\ -\cancel{x^2} + \cancel{x^2} + 2x = \cancel{x^2} - \cancel{x^2} \\ 2x = 0−x2 ∣ x2+2x=x2 ∣ −x2−x2+x2+2x=x2−x22x=0
0x2+2x+0=00x^2 + 2x + 0 = 00x2+2x+0=0
